chapters.summary: After Sam Altman shockingly, was fired as CEO of OpenAI, a huge kerfuffle has happened. Emmett Scheer, the former CEO of Twitch has broken his silence about the situation. Scheer traditionally has been found saying that we need to slow down the rate of development.

chapters.summary: The new CEO has a 30 day plan to reform the management and leadership team in light of recent departures, into an effective force to drive results for our customers. OpenAI stability and success are too important to allow turmoil to disrupt them like this.
